product_name: Peeled Snacks Paradise Found Fruit Snacks
long_description: Escape to a tropical paradise with the Peeled Snacks Paradise Found fruit snacks, a combination of organic mango, pineapple and banana. You'll be hooked after only one bite of gently dried fruit full of flavor. No added sugar, oil or preservatives.
short_description: Escape to a tropical paradise with the Peeled Snacks Paradise Found fruit snacks, a combination of organic mango, pineapple and banana.
